toplink:call.toplink:ejbql: SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenIssuerDataBean AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenIssuerDataBean a WHERE a.alias=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CADataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CADataBean a WHERE a.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenCertificateMapBean a WHERE a.tokenSN=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from EndEntityProfileDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from EndEntityProfileDataBean a WHERE a.profileName=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateProfileDataBean AS a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateProfileDataBean a WHERE a.certificateProfileName=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from TableProtectDataBean a WHERE a.dbType=?1 AND a.dbKey=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenProfileDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenProfileDataBean a WHERE a.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertReqHistoryDataBean a WHERE a.username=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertReqHistoryDataBean a WHERE a.issuerDN=?1 AND a.serialNumber=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenPropertyDataBean a WHERE a.id =?1 AND a.property=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenPropertyDataBean a WHERE a.property =?1 AND a.value=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataBean a WHERE a.status=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataBean a WHERE a.subjectDN=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataBean a WHERE a.subjectEmail=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataBean a WHERE a.subjectDN=?1 AND a.caId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataSourceDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from UserDataSourceDataBean a WHERE a.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from AdminGroupDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from AdminGroupDataBean a WHERE a.adminGroupName=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from ServiceDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from ServiceDataBean a WHERE a.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CRLDataBean a WHERE a.issuerDN=?1 AND a.crlNumber=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from PublisherDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from PublisherDataBean a WHERE a.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from PublisherQueueDataBean a WHERE a.publisherId=?1 and a.publishStatus=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from PublisherQueueDataBean a WHERE a.fingerprint=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from HardTokenDataBean a WHERE a.username=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from ApprovalDataBean a WHERE (a.status>'-3') and a.approvalId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from ApprovalDataBean a
SELECT OBJECT(a) from ApprovalDataBean a WHERE a.approvalId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.expireDate<?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.issuerDN=?1 AND a.serialNumber=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.subjectDN=?1 AND a.issuerDN=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.username=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.username=?1 AND a.status=?2 ORDER BY a.expireDate DESC, a.serialNumber DESC
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.subjectDN=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.serialNumber=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from CertificateDataBean a WHERE a.issuerDN=?1 AND a.subjectKeyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) from KeyRecoveryDataBean a WHERE a.username=?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) from KeyRecoveryDataBean a WHERE a.username=?1 AND a.markedAsRecoverable=TRUE
SELECT OBJECT(a) from GlobalConfigurationDataBean a WHERE a.configurationId=?1
